articles.description: A third win in a row for Michael Carrick highlights the failures of Ruben Amorim's time at Manchester United.
articles.title: Man Utd continue to make progress following Ruben Amorim's exit

articles.description: Arsenal will only have themselves to blame if they do not win the title as title rivals stumble in a perfect weekend for The Gunners, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Race for Premier League title: Arsenal sitting pretty as title rivals Man City and Aston Villa stumble

articles.description: Despite scoring a vital goal against Rayo Vallecano, why does forward Vinicius Jr continue to split opinion at the Bernabeu?
articles.title: Real Madrid: Why does Vinicius Jr divide fans?

articles.description: The key statistics and numbers behind Carlos Alcaraz's historic Australian Open victory.
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz wins Australian Open 2026: Numbers behind world number one's historic victory

articles.description: Liverpool agree a £60m deal with Rennes for defender Jeremy Jacquet, with the player set to join the Reds in the summer.
articles.title: Jeremy Jacquet: Liverpool agree £60m deal for Rennes defender

articles.description: Luke Littler wins the World Masters for the first time and becomes the joint-third most successful player in PDC history with a 6-5 win over Luke Humphries.
articles.title: Luke Littler 'greatest darts player ever' says Luke Humphries after teenager's World Masters win

articles.description: Tom Banton hits an unbeaten half-century as England pull off a brilliant DLS chase to beat Sri Lanka by six wickets in the second T20 international.
articles.title: Sri Lanka v England: Tom Banton's unbeaten half-century secures victory by six wickets in DLS chase in second T20 international in Pallekele

articles.description: More contentious VAR decisions in the Premier League have raised further questions on its effect on games as a spectacle.
articles.title: VAR: Are lengthy decisions ruining games as a spectacle?

articles.description: A gallant defeat in the Australian Open final showed Novak Djokovic is still among the very best - but he does not know what the future holds.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Novak Djokovic still believes he can win Grand Slams - but how many more will he play?

articles.description: Real Madrid are waiting to discover if midfielder Jude Bellingham faces a spell out after he suffers a muscle injury during the win against Rayo Vallecano.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham injury: Real Madrid and England wait on muscle injury
